name: Battlefield 4 - Main Menu UI Design
description:
This is Battlefield 4â€™s main menu UI that I recreated in Figma for educational purposes.


I also developed it as a website with Webflow:

https://battlefield-4-webflow-rebuild.webflow.io/


If you want to learn how it was developed, clone it on Webflow.


If you like it, consider sharing it!


Want to get in touch with me? Here are all the places you can find me:
